transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Ha, ha, abhi aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan ji, namaskar sir, main Aasim Khan bol raha tha IndiaMART se, district manager. Aapki company register hai IndiaMART ke saath mein sir.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: To ye main sir dekh raha tha aapka call aaya tha hamare customer care ke number par 96969696 par. Aapse baat bhi hui thi hamari team ki. Kuch
Customer: buyleads ko lekar sir aap problem face kar rahe hain sir jo IndiaMART par aapka Raj Art and Craft Orissa ke naam se.
Ji sir, ye mera problem ye hai ki mere buyleads jo main deal karta hu jis mein wo buyleads nahi aata hai mere ko, thik thak nahi aata hai. Do mahina ho gaya mera account mein lekin buyleads category aur mapping mein thoda problem aa raha hai. Wo wajah se mere ko
Executive: Sir, isme dekh raha tha aapke jo mostly, sorry main beech mein aapko rok raha hu. Aapne jo jitni bhi buylead consume kari hai jaise kal bhi aapne consume kari thi marble Ganesh statue ki aur Saraswati marble statue ki. To ye sare aapke products hue sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi, mere to aapke products nahi, mere dekhiye, mere category ki mein dekhiye, main pura India mein deal karna chahte ho mere se che district state mein mera hai abhi. Main to pura India mein deal karna chahti hu na.
Executive: Aap, aap all over India ki buyleads chahte ho na sir, main yahi to puch raha hu aap se.
Customer: Ji, ji, buyleads chahte hain.
Executive: India mein. To sir aap India par agar aap location mein, location mein agar aap dekhoge to location mein ek option aata hai India ka sir. India aap select karne ke baad aapko sir jo bhi all over
Customer: Mere jo location aapne, aapne mapping mein jo diya hai, dekhiye, mere, main jo deal karta hu wo jo buyleads mein dekhiye, aapko mil mil jayega mera.
Executive: Sir aapne all over India se, sir aapne all over India, nahi nahi sir mapping se kuch nahi hota hai. Aapne jo buylead consume kari hai wo all over India se kari hai. Bangalore, Pune, Kolkata, Chennai, Jaipur, Kochi, Indore, Bhubaneshwar, New Delhi, Lucknow, Hyderabad, Coimbatore, Delhi and kya kehte hain Sagwara aur kya kehte hain Dehradun and kya kehte hain aapka Boisar, Dilsa, Vishakhapatnam, Durgabanga, Kolar, Gwalior, Akola, Mumbai. Aapne all over India, 62 buyleads, 62 cities se buylead consume kar chuke ho sir aap abhi tak. 62 cities ki buylead aapne consume kar li hai sir.
Customer: Nahi consume kar li hai. Abhi mere dekhiye jo problem hai mera, main aapko dikha deta hu aapko yahi problem mera aisa hai. Kya hai ki mere jo
Executive: Batao aap mujhe.
Customer: Ye kya hai abhi problem kya hai khul raha hai. Kya page nahi khul raha hai abhi mera.
Executive: Aap open kar lo sir page aaram se open kar lo main call par hu koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai.
Customer: Ye network issue hai thoda, uski wajah se mere ko.
Executive: Kya issue hai?
Customer: Kal mere ko jo buylead mila hai, main search karne se milta hai lekin wo mere upar page pura dikhna chahiye na mere buylead mein aata hai, aata hai. Kisi lekin wo aisa nahi hota hai sir.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Nahi nahi, mera jo buylead mere pehle se jo char din se ek mam mere ko thik kiya kiya tha. Wo mere ko thik thak mila hai, do din thik thak mila. Wo baad mein mere maine ek mam ko phone kiya tha kya hai isme problem hai kya wo category mere ko thik karna hai wo granite, granite jo party aata hai isme mera lead jyada aata hai isko thik kar dijiye. Usne kya thik kiya.
Executive: Sir aapki jo bhi category, sorry main beech mein rok raha hu sir, sorry main beech mein aapko rok raha hu. Jo bhi sir aapki category hai na mujhe Muskan ne bataya bhi tha aap jo deal karte hain wo black stone aur jo statue hote hain black stone statue wagera usme aap deal karte hain. To wo category aapki already sari kuch
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan haan boliye.
Customer: Kya hai ki mera jo ye category dekhiye mapping mein jo aata hai mere to khul nahi raha hai abhi. Isme mere ko malum nahi lekin aap sir video call par, sir aap video call par kab available rahoge sir aap mujhe batao video call mein aapki taraf aa jata hu. Download jo aata hai na wo buyleads ki taraf mere abhi page down hai.
Executive: Sir buyleads ka jo aap bol rahe ho sir jo, jo buyleads ka sir aap bol rahe ho na aapki industry mein sir jitni bhi buyleads generate ho rahi hai all over India se wo aapko di ja rahi hai. Kabhi kabhi buyleads jyada available hoti hai to jyada milti hai, kam available hoti hai to kam milti hai. To isliye sir aapko lag raha hoga.
Customer: Nahi nahi, main, main, main jo aapko abhi dikha deta hu mere ko to server thoda network down hai. Main abhi mera main kya aapko dikha deta hu lekin sir isliye main, meri, sorry main, sir meri baat suniye aap meri baat suniye sir. Aap sir video call par aa sakte ho online?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan aa sakte hain lekin abhi mere buyleads nahi khul raha hai. Main to kholenge to aapko pata, bata dunga na ye jagah mera problem hai.
Executive: Nahi to usi time sir video, sir video call, sir video call pe ek bar dekh lenge. Sara kuch discussion bhi ho jayega, pura conclusion ho jayega fir achha rahega sir aapke liye.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Aap mujhe batao kis time available rahenge sir aap video call par aap bataiye mere ko.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Kitne baje aap online available rahenge video call par, kis time available rahenge online sir aap video call par?
Customer: Abhi, abhi ki tera.
Executive: Abhi available hai video call par aap?
Customer: Haan, ji, ji.
Executive: Thik hai main aapko abhi video call karwa raha hu sir abhi Muskan karegi aapko video call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Category and mapping issues in account.

- Page not opening to show the problem.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about buyleads generation process.

- Executive offered a video call for resolution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, mapping, video call
